article_title: Fewer Hours, Lower Incomes And Less Health Insurance

article_metadata.description: The Obama mandate translates into a healthcare minimum wage of $2.28 an hour (individual coverage) and $5.89 an hour (family coverage) for full time employees.
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: The Obama mandate translates into a healthcare minimum wage of $2.28 an hour (individual coverage) and $5.89 an hour (family coverage) for full time employees.
og.title: Obamacare In The Workplace: Fewer Hours, Lower Incomes And Less Health Insurance
